verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him, and the <S%H899>garments<s%> and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> and the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread;<s%>
and <S%H6950>assemble<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%> "

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him. When the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> was <S%H6950>assembled<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H6213>do.<s%>"
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H7364>washed<s%> them with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3801>tunic<s%> on him and <S%H2296>girded<s%> him with the <S%H73>sash,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> him with the <S%H4598>robe,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> on him; and he <S%H2296>girded<s%> him with the <S%H2805>artistic<s%> <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> with which he <S%H640>tied<s%> [it] to him.
He then <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2833>breastpiece<s%> on him, and in the <S%H2833>breastpiece<s%> he <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H224>Urim<s%> and the <S%H8550>Thummim.<s%>

He also <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H4701>turban<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and on the <S%H4701>turban,<s%> at its <S%H6440>front,<s%> he <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6731>plate,<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> then <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that was in it, and <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> them.

And he <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H3595>basin<s%> and its <S%H3653>stand,<s%> to <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> them.
Then he <S%H3332>poured<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on Aaron's <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him, to <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> him.

Next <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had Aaron's <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> them with <S%H3801>tunics,<s%> and <S%H2296>girded<s%> them with <S%H73>sashes,<s%> and <S%H2280>bound<s%> <S%H4021>caps<s%> on them, <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Then he <S%H5066>brought<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%>

Next <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> [it] and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> and with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> [some of it] <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H2398>purified<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> Then he <S%H3332>poured<s%> out [the rest of] the <S%H1818>blood<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> it, to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for it.

He also <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that was on the <S%H7130>entrails<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> and their <S%H2459>fat;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>offered<s%> it up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

But the <S%H6499>bull<s%> and its <S%H5785>hide<s%> and its <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and its <S%H6569>refuse,<s%> he <S%H8313>burned<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Then he <S%H7126>presented<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> [it] and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

When he had <S%H5408>cut<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> into its <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>offered<s%> up the <S%H7218>head<s%> and the <S%H5409>pieces<s%> and the <S%H6309>suet<s%> in <S%H6999>smoke.<s%>

After he had <S%H7364>washed<s%> the <S%H7130>entrails<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>offered<s%> up the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> It was a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma;<s%> it was an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Then he <S%H7126>presented<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>ordination;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> [it] and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8571>lobe<s%> of Aaron's <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the <S%H931>big<s%> <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot.<s%>

He also had Aaron's <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H8571>lobe<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the <S%H931>big<s%> <S%H931>toe<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot.<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> then <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> [the rest of] the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and the <S%H451>fat<s%> <S%H451>tail,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that was on the <S%H7130>entrails,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> and their <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh.<s%>

And from the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread<s%> that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> [mixed with] <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7550>wafer,<s%> and <S%H7760>placed<s%> [them] on the <S%H2459>portions<s%> of <S%H2459>fat<s%> and on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh.<s%>

He then <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> [these] on the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and on the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H5130>presented<s%> them as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> them from their <S%H3709>hands<s%> and <S%H6999>offered<s%> them up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> with the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%> They were an <S%H4394>ordination<s%> <S%H4394>offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma;<s%> it was an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> also <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%> and <S%H5130>presented<s%> it for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it was <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H4490>portion<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>ordination,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> Moses.

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> it on <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> on his <S%H899>garments,<s%> on his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and on the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him; and he <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him.

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H1310>"Boil<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> it <S%H8033>there<s%> together with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of the <S%H4394>ordination<s%> <S%H4394>offering,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H175>'Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.'
"And the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

"And you shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>outside<s%> the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3117>period<s%> of your <S%H4394>ordination<s%> is <S%H4390>fulfilled;<s%> for he will <S%H4390>ordain<s%> <S%H3027><s%> you through <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> as has been <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on your <S%H5921>behalf.<s%>

"At the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> moreover, you shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that you may not <S%H4191>die,<s%> for <S%H3651>so<s%> I have been <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"

Thus <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
